QuestData.Title: The Silkwood Road
QuestData.Description: West of here is the Silkwood Road. It has fallen into shadow as the spiders there have turned to a more evil and gluttonous path.$b$bI would face these villains myself but someone has to defend the noodle shop from... um... dangers and such.$b$bGo, hero, and conquer these beasts! Should you succeed perhaps I shall regale you with some of my epic tales of heroism.$b$bI'll also pay you.
QuestData.CompletionText: The silkwood stalkers are not in balance with nature. Predators are one thing but these creatures kill for pleasure. Harmony must be restored.
QuestData.RewardText: Such a noble hero. You remind me of a younger, less good looking version of myself.
